content.question: Which of the following formal elements of Liu Chunhua’s work contributes most to its meaning?

choices.label: The scale of the figure in the composition
The use of aerial perspective to create the illusion of space
The close attention to detail in the foreground

content.answer: The scale of the figure in the composition

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
